name: SWARM OF PIRANHAS
size_type_alignment: Medium Swarm of Tiny Beasts, Unaligned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny piranha. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5 (with Advantage if the target doesn't have all its Hit Points), reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage, or 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

raw_text:
AC 13 	Initiative +3 (13)
HP 28 (8d8 − 8)
Speed 5 ft., Swim 40 ft.
MOD 	SAVE
STR 	13 	+1 	+1
DEX 	16 	+3 	+3
CON 	9 	−1 	−1
MOD 	SAVE
INT 	1 	−5 	−5
WIS 	7 	−2 	−2
CHA 	2 	−4 	−4
Resistances Bludgeoning, Piercing, Slashing
Immunities Charmed, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Prone,
Restrained, Stunned
Senses Darkvision 60 ft.; Passive Perception 8
Languages None
CR 1 (XP 200; PB +2)
Traits
Swarm. The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and
the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny piranha. The
swarm can’t regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.
Water Breathing. The swarm can breathe only underwater.
Actions
Bites. Melee Attack Roll: +5 (with Advantage if the target doesn’t have all its
Hit Points), reach 5 ft.
Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage, or 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing
damage if the swarm is Bloodied.
Medium Swarm of Tiny Beasts, Unaligned
